snippet.title: Funny Racer Reveal (Playdate)
snippet.description:
Retro racing speeds onto Playdate with Funny Racer!

Buy it now at https://play.date/games/funny-racer/

Funny Racer is an indie 2D top-down retro racer for the Playdate console.

In Funny Racer, you can groove to simple controls that anyone can master, but perfecting your lines is a never-ending pursuit. As well, challenge your ghost on a retro-inspired track, and strive to unlock all 6 cars in your new Playdate obsession! 

All footage was captured in the simulator at 30 FPS.
